h, edges = np.histogramdd(np.random.random((counts, ndim)), bins=10)
g = Grid(h, edges)
g.grid = g.grid.astype(nptype)
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    with tmpdir.as_cwd():
        g.export(outfile)
pytest.mark.parametrize('outfile', ['grid.dx', 'grid.dx.gz'])pytest.mark.parametrize('nptype', ('complex64', 'complex128', 'bool_'))pytest.mark.filterwarnings('ignore:array dtype.name =')
